text: Zafra pumila is a species of sea snail in the family Columbellidae, the dove snails. ==Description== The shell size varies between 3 mm and 5 mm. File:Zafra pumila 01.jpg|Zafra pumila forma minuscula, dark variety File:Zafra pumila 02.jpg|Zafra pumila forma minuscula, bright variety ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Red Sea and in the Indian Ocean off Madagascar, Northern KwaZuluNatal, RSA, Réunion and in the Western Pacific Ocean, New Caledonia, Queensland, and New South Wales ==References== * Dautzenberg, Ph. (1929). '. Faune des Colonies Francaises, Tome III * pumila Category:Gastropods described in 1858
title: Zafra pumila
